name.description: name of the use case explaining briefly what it does
name.title: name of the use case

entitleonly.description: if set to true, no service instances will be created by the tool
entitleonly.title: if set to true, no service instances will be created by the tool

targetenvironment.description: environment in which the service should be created
targetenvironment.title: environment in which the service should be created

planCatalogName.description: catalog name of the service plan
planCatalogName.title: catalog name of the service plan

serviceparameterfile.description: parameter file for the service in case you want to provide the parameters via a file
serviceparameterfile.title: parameter file for the service

amount.description: amount to be used for the service
amount.title: amount to be used for the service

repeatstatusrequest.description: number of seconds when status should be checked
repeatstatusrequest.title: number of seconds when status should be checked

repeatstatustimeout.description: timeout in seconds after which the script will stop checking the status
repeatstatustimeout.title: timeout in seconds after which the script will stop checking the status

createServiceKeys.description: list of service keys to be created for the service
createServiceKeys.title: list of service keys to be created for the service

requiredServices.description: list of services that need to be there to create this service
requiredServices.title: list of services that need to be there to create this service

requiredrolecollections.description: list of role collections to assign users to
requiredrolecollections.title: list of role collections to assign users to

assignedUserGroupsFromParameterFile.description: use the name defined for the user group in the parameters.json file
assignedUserGroupsFromParameterFile.title: list of user groups to assign the role collection

assignrolecollections.description: list of role collections to be created within the btp account
assignrolecollections.title: list of role collections to be created within the btp account

executeAfterAccountSetup.description: create a list of commands, that should be executed after the SAP BTP account is setup
executeAfterAccountSetup.title: commands to run after setup of SAP BTP account

description.description: description of what the command will do
description.title: description of the command

command.description: the command that should be executed within the btpsa container image
command.title: command to execute

executeBeforeAccountSetup.description: create a list of commands, that should be executed before the SAP BTP account is setup
executeBeforeAccountSetup.title: commands to run before setup of SAP BTP account

description.description: description of what the command will do
description.title: description of the command

command.description: the command that should be executed within the btpsa container image
command.title: command to execute

executeToPruneUseCase.description: create a list of commands, that should be executed to prune the use case from your SAP BTP account
executeToPruneUseCase.title: commands to run to prune use case from your SAP BTP account

description.description: description of what the command will do
description.title: description of the command

command.description: the command that should be executed within the btpsa container image
command.title: command to execute

assignrolecollections.description: create a list of commands, that should be executed to prune the use case from your SAP BTP account
assignrolecollections.title: commands to run to prune use case from your SAP BTP account
